subject: Sexual Health
title: Dual Method Use
description: A micro-lesson that makes Dual Method Use usable.

hook.text: Using two methods at once can dramatically lower the chance of both pregnancy and STI transmission.

buildup.text: A common combination is the pill for pregnancy prevention and condoms for STI protection.

discovery.text: Dual method use drops the annual pregnancy risk below 1% even with typical use of each method.

twist.text: Studies show that many people stop using condoms once they start a hormonal method, losing STI protection.

climax.text: Encouraging dual use is one of the most effective strategies for comprehensive sexual health protection.

punchline.text: Two methods beat one. Layer your protection.

quiz.question: What does dual method use protect against?
